1{-# LANGUAGE ScopedTypeVariables #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Resource as bundle of relational expressions.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Resource.Include
7  ( resInclude,
8  ) where
9
10import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture                as O
11import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                    as B
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax                  as S
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type                    as T
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data                    as D
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Lexmap             as C
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relmap             as C
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Assert             as C
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Resource.Clause    as C
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Resource.Resource  as C
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Pattern          as P
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Message            as Msg
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relmap.Message     as Msg
23import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Resource.Message   as Msg
24
25-- | Include source code into resource.
26resInclude :: forall c. (D.CContent c)
27    => [S.Token]        -- ^ Additional terms
28    -> FilePath         -- ^ Context directory
29    -> C.Resource c     -- ^ Base resource
30    -> B.IxIOPoint      -- ^ Input point
31    -> B.Bz             -- ^ Source code
32    -> C.AbResource c   -- ^ Included resource
33resInclude resAbout cd base xio code =
34    do let ls   = S.tokenLines xio code
35           sec  = C.resLastSecNo base + 1
36           cs   = C.consClause resAbout sec ls
37       (cc, js, cs2) <- createJudges base cs
38       let ds   = D.dataset js
39           cs2' = reverse cs2
40           sec' | null cs   = sec
41                | otherwise = C.clauseSecNo $ C.clauseHead $ last cs
42       res <- B.foldM (resIncludeBody cd) base cs2'
43       Right res { C.resLastSecNo = sec'
44                 , C.resCacheT    = cc
45                 , C.resJudge     = js
46                 , C.resDataset   = ds }
47
48createJudges :: (D.CContent c) => C.Resource c -> [C.Clause] -> B.Ab (D.CacheT, [T.Judge c], [C.Clause])
49createJudges res = loop $ C.resCacheT res where
50    loop cc ((C.Clause h (C.CJudge q cl toks)) : cs) =
51        Msg.abClause [h] $ do
52           trees          <- S.toTrees toks
53           (cc1, judge)   <- D.treesJudge cc q cl trees
54           (cc2, js, cs') <- loop cc1 cs
55           Right (cc2, judge : js, cs')
56
57    loop cc (c : cs)  = do (cc', js, cs') <- loop cc cs
58                           Right (cc', js, c : cs')
59    loop cc []        = Right (cc, C.resJudge res, [])
60
61resIncludeBody :: forall c. (D.CContent c) =>
62    FilePath -> C.Resource c -> C.Clause -> C.AbResource c
63resIncludeBody cd res (C.Clause h@C.ClauseHead{ C.clauseSecNo = sec, C.clauseShort = sh } b) =
64    case b of
65      C.CAssert  q cl toks  -> ab $ assert q cl toks
66      C.CRelmap  n toks     -> ab $ relmap n toks
67      C.CSlot    n toks     -> ab $ slot n toks
68      C.CInput   toks       -> feat (ab $ input toks)  C.featInputClause  Msg.disabledInputClause  
69      C.COutput  toks       -> feat (ab $ output toks) C.featOutputClause Msg.disabledOutputClause
70      C.COption  toks       -> ab $ option toks
71      C.CEcho    clause     -> ab $ echo clause
72      C.CLicense line       -> ab $ license line
73      C.CUnknown (Left a)   -> Left a
74      _                     -> B.bug "resIncludeBody"
75    where
76
77      -- ----------------------  Utility
78
79      src :: [S.Token]
80      src = B.takeFirst $ B.clauseTokens $ C.clauseSource h
81
82      ab = Msg.abClause [h]
83
84      feature = C.resFeature res
85      feat e f msg | f feature = e
86                   | otherwise = msg
87
88      calc :: D.CalcContent c
89      calc = calcContG $ C.resGlobal res
90
91      f << y  = y : f res
92
93      -- ----------------------  Clause
94
95      assert typ cl toks =
96          do optPara <- C.ttreePara2 toks
97             let ass   = C.Assert sec typ cl src optPara Nothing []
98                 ass'  = S.Short (B.getCPs $ head src) sh ass
99             Right $ res { C.resAssert = C.resAssert << ass' }
100
101      relmap n toks =
102          do lt <- C.consLexmapTrees O.# C.ttreePara2 toks
103             Right $ res { C.resLexmap = C.resLexmap  << ((sec, n), lt) }
104
105      slot n toks =
106          do trees <- S.toTrees toks
107             Right res { C.resSlot = C.resSlot << (n, trees) }
108
109      option toks =
110          do opt <- C.optionParse calc toks $ C.resOption res
111             Right $ res { C.resOption = opt }
112
113      input toks =
114          do io <- ioPoint toks
115             checkIOPoint $ C.resQueueTodo io res
116
117      output toks =
118          do io <- ioPoint toks
119             checkIOPoint $ res { C.resOutput = C.inputPoint io }
120
121      ioPoint :: [S.Token] -> B.Ab C.InputPoint
122      ioPoint = paraToIOPoint cd O.#. C.ttreePara2
123
124      checkIOPoint :: B.AbMap (C.Resource c)
125      checkIOPoint res' = let ins = C.resInput  res'
126                              out = C.resOutput res'
127                         in if out `elem` ins
128                            then Msg.sameIOPoints out
129                            else Right res'
130
131      echo clause =
132          Right $ res { C.resEcho = C.resEcho << B.clauseLines clause }
133
134      license line =
135          Right $ res { C.resLicense = C.resLicense << (C.clauseSecNo h, line) }
136
137calcContG :: (D.CContent c) => C.Global c -> D.CalcContent c
138calcContG = D.calcTree . D.getCops
139
140paraToIOPoint :: FilePath -> C.TTreePara -> B.Ab C.InputPoint
141paraToIOPoint cd = S.paraSelect unmatch ps where
142    ps = [ (pJust1, just1)
143         , (pStdin, stdin) ]
144
145    pJust1 = S.paraSpec $ S.paraJust 1 . S.paraOpt ["about"]
146    pStdin = S.paraSpec $ S.paraReq ["stdin"]
147
148    just1 :: C.TTreePara -> B.Ab C.InputPoint
149    just1 p = do arg   <- S.paraGetFst p
150                 about <- S.paraGetOpt [] p "about"
151                 case arg of
152                   P.LText _ path -> let iop = B.ioPointDir cd $ B.ioPoint path
153                                     in Right $ C.InputPoint iop about
154                   _ -> Msg.adlib "input not text"
155
156    stdin :: C.TTreePara -> B.Ab C.InputPoint
157    stdin p = do args <- S.paraGet p "stdin"
158                 case args of
159                   [] -> Right $ C.InputPoint (B.IOPointStdin Nothing) []
160                   _  -> Msg.adlib "input no args"
161
162    unmatch = Msg.adlib "input unknown"
163
